title: Aleksei Buznyakov
text:
Aleksei Vasilyevich Buznyakov (; born 13 February 1985) is a Russian former professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
Club career.
He played in the <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> for <a href="FC%20Metallurg%20Krasnoyarsk">FC Metallurg Krasnoyarsk</a> in 2006.
